entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: 20 Watch Games - Classic Pack
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.99 ‚Üí Free (Free ~ $0.99)Ôºâ

Application Description

A pack of 20 mini games for you to enjoy on your Apple Watch, Apple TV or your iPhone/iPad. ‚óâ Brick Puzzle Drag finger to move the bricks around. Tap to rotate and swipe down to drop. ‚óâ Jewel Blitz A match 3 game style. Detonate as many gems as you can in 60s. ‚óâ Gold Miner Aim on the gold while the hook swings. Tap on the screen to release the hook. ‚óâ Number Puzzle Swipe to combine numbers for score. ‚óâ Sudoku (6x6) Fill in all the empty squares without using the same number twice in each column, row, or box. ‚óâ Bubble Shooter Tap to shoot bubble. ‚óâ Find Word With 4 letters, you have 10s to find a word. If time runs out, you lose. ‚óâ Color Lines Remove balls by forming lines (horizontal, vertical or diagonal) of at least five balls of the same color. Get the highscore! ‚óâ Mine Sweeper Tap to reveal a square. If a square containing a mine, you lose. Reveal all square to win. ‚óâ Brick Breaker Drag your finger to move your paddle and hit the ball. Destroy all the blocks to finish levels. ‚óâ Maze Man Swipe to change direction, collect all things on the map but don't touch the devil! ‚óâ Boxing Tap left/right to move, mid to punch.. ‚óâ Crazy Tennis Feel like crazy while playing with AI. Drag your finger to move your paddle. Don't let the ball out. ‚óâ Block Ninja Control the ninja to avoid all spikes and get best score. ‚óâ Tappy Bird Tap the screen to fly up. Don't hit anything. ‚óâ Snake Swipe to change snake direction. ‚óâ Tic-Tac-Toe Challenge your brain with the AI. ‚óâ Pin Hack Find the pin number before timeout. ‚óâ ATM Use your math skill to give the right money request. ‚óâ What Number Find the next number of a number chain. => On Apple Watch please use Digital Crown to exit game. Thanks for all your feedback!!!

iPad
